author: dependabot-preview[bot]
body:
Bumps [Microsoft.ApplicationInsights](https://github.com/Microsoft/ApplicationInsights-dotnet) from 2.7.2 to 2.9.1.
Changelog *Sourced from [Microsoft.ApplicationInsights's changelog](https://github.com/microsoft/ApplicationInsights-dotnet/blob/develop/CHANGELOG.md).* > ## Version 2.9.1 > - [Aggregation thread is now a background thread](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/Microsoft/ApplicationInsights-dotnet/issues/1080) > > ## Version 2.9.0 > - [Move W3C methods from Web SDK](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/Microsoft/ApplicationInsights-dotnet/pull/1064) > > ## Version 2.9.0-beta3 > - [Flatten IExtension and Unknown ITelemetry implementations for Rich Payload Event Source consumption](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/Microsoft/ApplicationInsights-dotnet/pull/1017) > - [Fix: Start/StopOperation with W3C distributed tracing enabled does not track telemetry](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/Microsoft/ApplicationInsights-dotnet/pull/1031) > - [Fix: Do not run metric aggregation on a thread pool thread](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/Microsoft/ApplicationInsights-dotnet/pull/1028) > > ## Version 2.9.0-beta2 > - [Remove unused reference to System.Web.Extensions](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/Microsoft/ApplicationInsights-dotnet/pull/956) > - [PageViewTelemetry](https://github.com/Microsoft/ApplicationInsights-dotnet/blob/8673ed1d15005713755e0bb9594acfe0ee00b869/src/Microsoft.ApplicationInsights/DataContracts/PageViewTelemetry.cs) now supports [ISupportMetrics](https://github.com/Microsoft/ApplicationInsights-dotnet/blob/39a5ef23d834777eefdd72149de705a016eb06b0/src/Microsoft.ApplicationInsights/DataContracts/ISupportMetrics.cs) > - [Fixed a bug in TelemetryContext which prevented rawobject store to be not available in all sinks.](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/Microsoft/ApplicationInsights-dotnet/issues/974) > - [Fixed a bug where TelemetryContext would have missing values on secondary sinks](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/Microsoft/ApplicationInsights-dotnet/pull/993) > - [Fixed race condition in BroadcastProcessor which caused it to drop TelemetryItems](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/Microsoft/ApplicationInsights-dotnet/pull/995) > - [Custom Telemetry Item that implements ITelemetry is no longer dropped, bur rather serialized as EventTelemetry and handled by the channels accordingly](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/Microsoft/ApplicationInsights-dotnet/issues/988) > - [IExtension is now serialized into the Properties and Metrics](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/Microsoft/ApplicationInsights-dotnet/issues/1000) > > Perf Improvements. > - [Improved Perf of ITelemetry JsonSerialization](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/Microsoft/ApplicationInsights-dotnet/issues/997) > - [Added new method on TelemetryClient to initialize just instrumentation. This is to be used by autocollectors to avoid calling TelemetryInitializers twice.](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/Microsoft/ApplicationInsights-dotnet/issues/966) > - [RequestTelemetry modified to lazily instantiate ConcurrentDictionary for Properties](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/Microsoft/ApplicationInsights-dotnet/issues/969) > - [RequestTelemetry modified to not service public fields with data class to avoid converting between types.](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/Microsoft/ApplicationInsights-dotnet/issues/965) > - [Dependency Telemetry modified to lazily instantiate ConcurrentDictionary for Properties](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/Microsoft/ApplicationInsights-dotnet/issues/1002) > - [Avoid string allocations in Metrics hot path](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/Microsoft/ApplicationInsights-dotnet/issues/1004) > > ## Version 2.8.1 > [Patch release addressing perf regression.](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/Microsoft/ApplicationInsights-dotnet/issues/952) > > ## Version 2.8.0 > - [New API to store/retrieve any raw objects on TelemetryContext to enable AutoCollectors to pass additional information for use by TelemetryInitializers.](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/Microsoft/ApplicationInsights-dotnet/issues/937) > - Perf Improvements > [#927](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/Microsoft/ApplicationInsights-dotnet/issues/927) > [#930](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/Microsoft/ApplicationInsights-dotnet/issues/930) > [#934](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/Microsoft/ApplicationInsights-dotnet/issues/934) > - Fix: [Response code shouldn't be overwritten to 200 if not set](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/Microsoft/ApplicationInsights-dotnet/pull/918) > > ## Version 2.8.0-beta2 > - [TelemetryProcessors (sampling, autocollectedmetricaggregator), TelemetryChannel (ServerTelemetryChannel) added automatically to the default ApplicationInsights.config are moved under the default telemetry sink.](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/Microsoft/ApplicationInsights-dotnet/issues/907) > If you are upgrading, and have added/modified TelemetryProcessors/TelemetryChannel, make sure to copy them to the default sink section. > > ## Version 2.8.0-beta1 > - [Add a new distinct properties collection, GlobalProperties, on TelemetryContext, and obsolete the Properties on TelemetryContext.](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/Microsoft/ApplicationInsights-dotnet/issues/820) > - [Added support for strongly typed extensibility for Telemetry types using IExtension.](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/Microsoft/ApplicationInsights-dotnet/issues/871) > - [New method SerializeData(ISerializationWriter writer) defined in ITelemetry. All existing types implement this method to emit information about it's fields to channels who can serialize this data] > (continuation of https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/Microsoft/ApplicationInsights-dotnet/issues/871) > - [Allow to track PageViewPerformance data type](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/Microsoft/ApplicationInsights-dotnet/issues/673). > - Added method `ExceptionDetailsInfoList` on `ExceptionTelemetry` class that gives control to user to update exception > ... (truncated)
Commits - [`b828365`](https://github.com/microsoft/ApplicationInsights-dotnet/commit/b828365832bc46fd2eb3e1cf2c3f0b8e91cd239d) Version Update 2.9.1 - [`06f4dc0`](https://github.com/microsoft/ApplicationInsights-dotnet/commit/06f4dc0bfc76a719f312ff3b4005cc628137d706) Chagelog update - [`9d98194`](https://github.com/microsoft/ApplicationInsights-dotnet/commit/9d98194cd8e90d34000db6cc82bd7371afd3df8d) Make aggregation thread run in background - [`219d72f`](https://github.com/microsoft/ApplicationInsights-dotnet/commit/219d72f73dafb257ebe7623ad8a681b3a7002091) Merge pull request [#1074](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/Microsoft/ApplicationInsights-dotnet/issues/1074) from Microsoft/dmitmatv_stable_upd1 - [`802d94b`](https://github.com/microsoft/ApplicationInsights-dotnet/commit/802d94b3006333e80bd6805f2b4baac94a81627d) Do not create Nuget on Linux builds - [`1456430`](https://github.com/microsoft/ApplicationInsights-dotnet/commit/1456430342ca05b7305409adc75f978528b836ff) Temporary exclude license on Linux (dependency on the latest 2.1.5 .NET Core ... - [`bc13ee5`](https://github.com/microsoft/ApplicationInsights-dotnet/commit/bc13ee59ef5cc37f95ed8046de9e3226b229a4b6) Update Nuget version - [`552de92`](https://github.com/microsoft/ApplicationInsights-dotnet/commit/552de9287a293fd87deee597092a32ef1299f860) Add license expression - [`7d80367`](https://github.com/microsoft/ApplicationInsights-dotnet/commit/7d80367975b6e27bab188eff608e032d72f8fa1e) LicenseUrl to License - [`866f1b5`](https://github.com/microsoft/ApplicationInsights-dotnet/commit/866f1b588e6c5c27f50e7dd11510f4af0cfdd4e7) Fix net46 and and tests - Additional commits viewable in [compare view](https://github.com/Microsoft/ApplicationInsights-dotnet/compare/2.7.2...2.9.1)

[![Dependabot compatibility score](https://api.dependabot.com/badges/compatibility_score?dependency-name=Microsoft.ApplicationInsights&package-manager=nuget&previous-version=2.7.2&new-version=2.9.1)](https://dependabot.com/compatibility-score.html?dependency-name=Microsoft.ApplicationInsights&package-manager=nuget&previous-version=2.7.2&new-version=2.9.1) Dependabot will resolve any conflicts with this PR as long as you don't alter it yourself. You can also trigger a rebase manually by commenting `@dependabot rebase`. [//]: # (dependabot-automerge-start) [//]: # (dependabot-automerge-end) --- **Note:** This repo was added to Dependabot recently, so you'll receive a maximum of 5 PRs for your first few update runs. Once an update run creates fewer than 5 PRs we'll remove that limit. You can always request more updates by clicking `Bump now` in your [Dependabot dashboard](https://app.dependabot.com).
Dependabot commands and options
You can trigger Dependabot actions by commenting on this PR: - `@dependabot rebase` will rebase this PR - `@dependabot recreate` will recreate this PR, overwriting any edits that have been made to it - `@dependabot merge` will merge this PR after your CI passes on it - `@dependabot squash and merge` will squash and merge this PR after your CI passes on it - `@dependabot cancel merge` will cancel a previously requested merge and block automerging - `@dependabot reopen` will reopen this PR if it is closed - `@dependabot ignore this [patch|minor|major] version` will close this PR and stop Dependabot creating any more for this minor/major version (unless you reopen the PR or upgrade to it yourself) - `@dependabot ignore this dependency` will close this PR and stop Dependabot creating any more for this dependency (unless you reopen the PR or upgrade to it yourself) - `@dependabot badge me` will comment on this PR with code to add a "Dependabot enabled" badge to your readme Additionally, you can set the following in the `.dependabot/config.yml` file in this repo: - Update frequency (including time of day and day of week) - Automerge options (never/patch/minor, and dev/runtime dependencies) - Pull request limits (per update run and/or open at any time) - Out-of-range updates (receive only lockfile updates, if desired) - Security updates (receive only security updates, if desired) Finally, you can contact us by mentioning @dependabot.

comments.author: dependabot-preview[bot]
comments.body:
OK, I won't notify you again about this release, but will get in touch when a new version is available.

If you change your mind, just re-open this PR and I'll resolve any conflicts on it.

title: Build(deps): Bump Microsoft.ApplicationInsights from 2.7.2 to 2.9.1
